answers.answer: I've had it with my son and daughter and praying i dont have it this time, but most likely i will. Won't find out till my next appointment.
What do they do if u have it?
Same here...pretty much if u can't keep ur bp normal u can end up having the baby early...it can also cause u to have seizures which I had the baby early and had seizures w/preeclampsia
That was w/my first child...had her in 29 weeks and she weighed 2lbs...she stayed in the hospital for about 3 months and she is now a healthy 16 year old :)

I did with my son. I gained 30 lbs of water. I could barely walk. I had protein in my urine and very high blood pressure.  I was 34w6d when my dr had seen I gained 10 lbs in 10.days. I was sent to the hospital and induced the next day. I guess my symptoms were so severe that they were afraid I would start having seizures.  My son was born at 35 weeks by emergency c section.  NICU for 2 weeks. He was fine. I guess there's blood pressure meds they can give now. I'm not sure how far along you are, but if you're already in the hospital that's a safe place.  I'm sure you both will be fine!

I had preclampsia with my daughter and was on strict bed rest in the hospital for 2 weeks! I ended up having her at 35 weeks and she came out 7lbs 3oz and very healthy! We only had to stay in the hospital for 2 days just to keep on eye on her and I then we were sent home! It was truly one of the scariest times of my life but luckily after I delivered we didn't have anymore complications. Good luck!

Wow sooo glad to hear all went well for you ladies!! Im 35+3. They have given me bp meds..but its not seemin to really work. I was in the hospital for a 24 watch and urine test so ill get them back monday..im prayin its not that. But if it is im ready to do anything to make sure my baby is safe and ok. Ive been havin high bp for about three weeks now.

I had it with my first son along with placenta flow problems. Mind you it was 7 months after my heart attack. Yes I was 20 and a lot of health complications at the time. My son was born at 32 weeks and spent 68 days in the nicu. He is a healthy 9 year old today. Good luck and try not to stress as that increases your BP.
Thank you! Are there any other sym. besides the bp n urine?

This is all very helpful info for me too. I'm 15 weeks and the doc asked me to come in for a second urine test due to concerns of preeclampsia.  I always thought they tested for that much later. Definitely nervous..

I had it with my first from 28wks and he was delivered at 35wks when they were no longer able to manage the symptoms. This time they picked it up at 15wks and they were managing it really well but I went into labour at 27wks and am still in hospital 6 days later trying not to have this baby. Its very serious and while they can't prevent it there is a lot they can do to manage your bp and keep you comfortable and ensure baby gets everything it can from you, just listen to your body, rest, and do everything they tell you too.
If blood pressure skyrockets mom can have a stroke.  If BP is not controlled, delivery is the only cure.

question: Has anyone had or dealt with preeclampsia or eclampsia? Ive been in the hopstial for high bp and i get my urine test results monday.. Im nervse i dont want anythings happenin to my baby!!
title: Preeclampsia!!
